sense.def: EA, Pathological Mechanism of a yin xu huo dong 陰虛火動 , yin depletion with excited fire, resulting from a unilateral insufficiency of yin body liquid. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qiu shi 秋石： 病淋者水虛火極，則煎熬成沙成石 , 小便之煉成秋石，與此一理也 , “When [patients] suffer from dripping, with water depletion with extreme fire , the boiling will generate sands or stones. When tempering of urine with fire generates qiu shi , then this is the same principle”.
